name: arcane
tagline: A privacy-focused team chat and automation platform with channels and workflows
description: Arcane is an open-source, privacy-first chat and automation platform designed for teams. It offers a Slack-like interface with channels, tasks, and workflows, and can be self-hosted for better data ownership.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Privacy-first communication platform with Slack-like interface. Collaborate securely

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Organize conversations by topic, project, or team. Structured communication

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Integrated tasks and workflows within chat context. Work where you talk

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete data ownership and control over communications. Your conversations, your server
